EventActionConfiguration
struct
EventActionConfiguration
Type

Types for the event action

NONE

0x00 - No action. Parameters should be empty

GPIO

0x01 - Control the state of a GPIO pin. See EventActionGpioParameter

MESSAGE

0x02 - Output a data packet. See EventActionMessageParameter

instance
uint8 instance

Action number

trigger
uint8 trigger

ID of trigger that will cause this action to occur. If 0, this action is not linked to any event triggers.

type
Type type

Type of action

parameters
EventActionParameters parameters

Action parameters
